text:
Hello Twentyninetimes,
1. In your HubSpot account, navigate to Marketing > Files and Templates > Files.
2. Click the name of the video where you want to add captions or subtitles.
3. In the right panel, click to expand the Subtitles section.
4. Click Upload captions.
 <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/add-videos-to-your-HubSpot-content>

I may be over complicating this but I’m already in the spaghetti so I shall continue on:

Is there a way to access the field settings of a custom module on a specific webpage?
Eg. I want to know what menu was selected to display on a specific page so I can display that same menu programmatically on another page.
There’s almost certainly no way to do this in the way that you described. You’re probably going to need to use a global partial or global module to pull this off.
Hello everyone, I want to know if I can use Hubl code here? I want to use the data filled in the user form:smiling_face_with_tear:
